title: Find Your LD
description: Find your Legislative District and volunteer.
report: Click on the link above and find your LD. Then, Google for your LD website to find out how you can help. All LDs have many opportunities for volunteering. Even a few hours will make a difference.

title: Be the Blue Wave
description: Be part of the Neighbor to Neighbor Program.
report: Click on the link above! This short training program will give you the skills and tools you need to reach out to Democrats and Independents in your neighborhood. The process and message are clear. You just need to remind them to vote.

title: Voter Registration
report: Contact the Maricopa County Democratic Party at https://www.maricopadems.org/ or (602)-298-0503 for volunteer opportunities. Click on the link or phone icon above. Even a few hours will make a difference.

title: Support Sinema
report: We can send a Democratic Senator to Congress when we help to elect Kyrsten Sinema. Click on the link above and help-give money, give time, give support.

title: Support Malik
report: We need to support Anita Malik because she is smart, well-spoken and brings a business focus that is attractive to voters in CD 6. Let's send a Democrat to Congress! Click on the link above and help-give money, give time, give support.

title: Canvass,Text,Phone
report: All Legislative Districts need our help NOW. Join LD28 on Oct 4 at 5:30pm, Oct 6 at 8:30am, Oct 8 at 4-7pm. Meet at the LD28 office at 10401 N 32nd St, PHX. OR, click on the link above and find your LD. Then, Google for your LD website to find out how you can help. Even a few hours will make a difference.

title: Support Marsh
report: We can send a Democratic Senator to the AZ Senate when we help to elect Christene Marsh. Click on the link above and help-give money, give time, give support.

title: Support Butler
report: We must send Kelli Butler back to the AZ House of Representatives. Click on the link above and help-give money, give time, give support.

title: Join AZ DLCC
description: Help elect Democrats in the AZ House and Senate.
report: Republicans control both chambers of the AZ state legislature, but we're here to change that. Click on the link above and sign up today. Every seat in the State Legislature is up for election and Democrats are just three seats away from taking back control of the State Senate.

title: Text for Democrats
description: Only 16 days to text out the Vote.
report: Join our text team to talk to voters across the country about what's at stake in this election. Texting is quick, easy, and effective! The best part? You can participate from anywhere -- your home, a coffee shop, or with friends. Click on the link and sign up today, and we'll send you everything you need to start texting.

title: #VotingSquad
description: Help our friends and neighbors to vote.
report: The #VotingSquad initiative encourages people to put together a five-person “squad” that will encourage everyone in the group to vote by Nov. 6. As the leader of the squad, it’s up to you to make sure these people are ready to vote. Challenge 3 - 5 others to form their own voting squads. Click on the link above and get started.

title: Vote! Vote! Vote!
report: If you haven’t yet cast a ballot, get out and do it NOW. Help your family, friends and neighbors do the same. Help a stranger. Vote as if the future of our country depends on it. Because it does.

title: Congratulations Kyrsten
report: We are sending a Democratic Senator, a woman, to Congress from AZ! We elected Kyrsten Sinema! Thank you to all who supported Kyrsten! On to 2020!

title: Make Every Vote Count
description: Help with the Florida recount efforts.
report: If you live in or near FL, your support is needed! Don’t live nearby? Forward this to someone you know in FL, or share on Facebook or Twitter. What: Help with the FL recount efforts; Where: Across FL; When: 11/14 through 11/19. Click on the link above and help-give money,give time.

title: Support Espy
description: Democrat in the U.S. Senate runoff.
report: A U.S. Senate runoff that was supposed to provide an easy Republican win in Mississippi has turned into an unexpectedly competitive contest. Espy is attempting to become the state’s first black senator since shortly after the Civil War. Click on the link above and help-give money, give support.

title: Congratulate Democrats
report: We did it! Now, say thanks and offer our support. Click on the link and find an elected Democrat to call or text to congratulate and to offer your help as they begin their service.

title: Commit to Your LD
report: Commit for 2019 to connect with your LD. Attend the monthly meetings and get involved. We need to work in 2019 to make 2020 happen! Click on the link above and find your LD. Then, Google for your LD website to find the monthly meeting dates and how you can help. All LDs have many opportunities for volunteering.

title: Support Emerge America
description: Help Democratic Women Run and Win!
report: ”We inspire women to run. We hone their skills to win.”  406 alums of Emerge America won their races in 2018! Click on the link NOW to support recruiting and training for 2020.

title: Persist!
report: “Wisconsin Gov. Scott Walker (R) on Friday signed sweeping legislation that weakens the power of the incoming Democratic governor and attorney general.” Click on the link and read the article. Then, commit to persisting in 2019.

title: Support Gallego
report: We need to support Kate Gallego for PHX Mayor because she is smart, entrepreneurial, has extensive business development experience, and is passionate about helping the people of PHX. Let's elect Kate on March 12th! Click on the link above and help-give money, give time, give support.

title: Women’s March
report: While considerable progress was made in the 2018 election, our work is not done. Join in the 2019 Women’s March on January 19 at 10am- 2pm. Click on the link for details. Let’s make our voices heard!

title: National Call Day
report: Call to end the shutdown with no wall funding. The urgency to keep up the pressure on our Senators only gets higher the longer this shutdown drags on. Mark your calendars (and charge your phones!) for a national call-in day of action on Wednesday, 1/23.

title: Request to Speak
report: Want your AZ legislators to hear your voice? Request to Speak (RTS) is the answer! It's easy and quick. Stop by on Feb 10 to find out about RTS and learn how to navigate the system, letting your Reps know where you stand. We'll be there to show you how. Click on the link above for more information.

title: Vote! Gallego!
report: If you haven’t yet mailed in your ballot, do it NOW. Help your family, friends and neighbors do the same. Vote as if the future of Phoenix depends on it. Because it does.

title: Support Gallego
description: Kate Gallego needs our support NOW.
report: We need to support Kate Gallego for PHX Mayor because she is smart, entrepreneurial, has extensive business development experience, and is passionate about helping the people of PHX. Let's elect Kate on March 12th! Click on the link above and help-give money, give time, give support.

title: Vote! Vote! Vote!
report: If you haven’t yet cast a ballot in the PHX Mayoral election, get out and vote on March 12th. Help your neighbors do the same. This election matters!

title: Vote Today!
report: If you haven’t yet cast a ballot in the PHX Mayoral election, get out and vote TODAY, March 12th. Help your neighbors do the same. This election matters!

title: Constituent Coffee
report: Come join your local Democrats for an informational update on what's going on in the State Legislature! We will be joined by District 28 Representatives Kelli Butler and Aaron Lieberman, who will be available for questions about bills and proposals moving through the Legislature.Join us on 3/30 at Mountain View Park 9901 N 7th Ave, PHX 85021 at 9am.

title: ActNowAZ
description: Click here for a simple explanation of how the ActNowAZ App works!
report: Every Tuesday, your iPhone or iPad will ping with a notification of a specific way that we can help to deliver for Democrats in 2019 and 2020. Open the App and you will have your idea for the week. And, the ideas for previous weeks will remain open, so check them out, too. Join us and make your voice heard and your actions matter.
